about_the_game:
Give your maps and cutscenes the right vibes with the Fantasy Wonderland RPG Music pack! 10 BGM tracks offer up something spooky, something quirky, and something dangerous with their synth instruments and catchy melodies. Use this pack’s three versions of ‘Serenade’ to quickly remind your players of an overarching theme to the quests, with the upbeat piano version playing the first time they learn of the quest, then changing to the spooky version with jingling chimes repeats the melody when your heroes discover the truth behind the quest. When they’ve finally finished, give them their hard-earned rewards while the full version of ‘Serenade’ plays with a bunch of strings, horns, and drums all building to a dramatic end. Fill a lonely cathedral with the haunted organ tunes of ‘Requiem for the Restless’ or use the organ in ‘Stained Glass Shadows’ to add a sense of unease to a quiet village your heroes just reached.

Get your players’ toes tapping with the upbeat electric guitars and piano of ‘Ghostly Giggles’ while they’re exploring dungeons or mysterious basements, and have them battle phantasmical foes while electric guitars rip in the background thanks to ‘Midnight Mass Murmurs’. Each track comes in M4a and looping Ogg file formats, so you can add them to your current RPG Maker project or use them in your favorite engine! Pick up the Fantasy Wonderland RPG Music pack and set the mood with songs with repeated melodies or tunes with underlying sinister tones in an otherwise peace-looking village!

Contents:

* 10 BGM royalty free
* m4a and ogg formats included
detailed_description:
Give your maps and cutscenes the right vibes with the Fantasy Wonderland RPG Music pack! 10 BGM tracks offer up something spooky, something quirky, and something dangerous with their synth instruments and catchy melodies. Use this pack’s three versions of ‘Serenade’ to quickly remind your players of an overarching theme to the quests, with the upbeat piano version playing the first time they learn of the quest, then changing to the spooky version with jingling chimes repeats the melody when your heroes discover the truth behind the quest. When they’ve finally finished, give them their hard-earned rewards while the full version of ‘Serenade’ plays with a bunch of strings, horns, and drums all building to a dramatic end. Fill a lonely cathedral with the haunted organ tunes of ‘Requiem for the Restless’ or use the organ in ‘Stained Glass Shadows’ to add a sense of unease to a quiet village your heroes just reached.

Get your players’ toes tapping with the upbeat electric guitars and piano of ‘Ghostly Giggles’ while they’re exploring dungeons or mysterious basements, and have them battle phantasmical foes while electric guitars rip in the background thanks to ‘Midnight Mass Murmurs’. Each track comes in M4a and looping Ogg file formats, so you can add them to your current RPG Maker project or use them in your favorite engine! Pick up the Fantasy Wonderland RPG Music pack and set the mood with songs with repeated melodies or tunes with underlying sinister tones in an otherwise peace-looking village!

* m4a and ogg formats included

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
